## About This Site

This website is built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), a powerful scientific publishing system that seamlessly integrates **modern AI research** with **professional presentation**:

- **Markdown** for elegant, readable documentation of LLM architectures
- **Jupyter Notebooks** for interactive Python implementations (PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers)
- **Mermaid diagrams** for visualizing agent-based systems and RAG pipelines
- **Mathematical notation** for precise algorithmic descriptions and model formulations

Whether you're here to explore **enterprise LLM implementations**, learn about **multimodal AI architectures**, or follow along with cutting-edge research in **AI-driven scientific discovery**, you'll find content that bridges advanced research with practical enterprise applications.

### What You'll Find Here

- **LLM Research Insights**: Deep dives into fine-tuning, RAG, and agent-based architectures
- **Implementation Tutorials**: PyTorch/TensorFlow code for advanced AI systems
- **Enterprise Case Studies**: From PoC to production deployment of AI solutions
- **Technical Architecture**: System design patterns for scalable AI applications
- **Industry Applications**: Real-world implementations across Scientific Discovery, Finance, and Manufacturing
